name: I WILL BE THERE (PS Vita Exclusive DEMO)
name_original: I WILL BE THERE (PS Vita Exclusive DEMO)
description:
I WILL BE THERE is a procedurally-generated, point & click survival-adventure game. It is currently in active development and will be released on STEAM (PC). 

PlayStation Vita users can exclusively enjoy this demo following these instructions:

  • Install YoYo Loader to your Vita following this link.
  • Download the demo from this page.
  • Place the "I Will Be There DEMO" folder itself from the zip file, to this location on your Vita: ux0:/data/gms/
  • Launch YoYo Loader on Vita and then start the demo!

!!! Fix: Turning on "Bilinear Filtering" makes text more readable. Turn on that setting on YoyoLoader by pressing triangle before launching the game.

Your feedback is always appreciated! 

Please do leave a comment and share your thoughts :)
